headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: CNN Covers The 4th Of July Celebration In America. Aired 11p- 12a ET

utterances.speaker: SARA SIDNER, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: And we have to remember, people love the 4th of July here. You've got Naval Base San Diego. You've got 48,000 sailors and personnel.

utterances.speaker: VICTOR BLACKWELL, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And so, when they do this, they put on a great parade. All of the houses --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Oh, I was out this morning --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: They decorate --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- 7 a.m. I rented a bike here at the hotel, rode down --(CROSSTALK) I know. You know, got up early, took a look and the chairs were out there ready for the parade. There was a road race today. I mean, they really -- there was bunting.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Bunting.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Bunting on houses for 4th of July.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: A lot of them. They really do it up here in San Diego.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And we can't wait for you to see some of the performances. They're getting ready to launch this huge firework show.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It took them four days to create this show, the Big Bay Boom. As you heard from Victor, it's another must-see moment on Independence Day.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We're also going to take you to the Las Vegas Strip. Things are going to light up really soon. We're bringing you a spectacular firework show, one after another, after another, right here on CNN. So, relax and enjoy.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: The Sphere. Grateful Dead, baby.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Listen to that crowd. That was T-Pain, the one and only from Tallahassee, Florida. He was performing there at the Tacos and Tequila Festival in Kansas City. Do you know he was the first ever winner of the Masked Singer?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm not surprised. He has this amazing range.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: He does.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: People thought that he needed autotunes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Nope.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: He absolutely does not. And I know you all caught us dancing during that performance. I don't know how anybody stands still when he's performing in those songs, especially "Buy U a Drank." I mean, that just --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: You can't -- you can't --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- lends itself to a double.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Ah, ah, ah --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: So, I mean this is the fun we're having.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: What do you double up on?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I mean, I was talking about the move --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Oh.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- but also, we could take a double shot of something as well. (LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We still got the Chicago fireworks show that's going on. We have so many shows coming up. T-Pain just starting off the move toward the West. We are taking you to some places that we've not taken you before on this show, including 6,000 miles away to the fireworks show in Guam. It is going to be an amazing night.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Spectacular.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Howdy, Houston. It is the next stop on our Independence Day tour of fireworks. It's starting, you all. All right, we are watching the 4th in America on CNN. We're a part of it and you get to see it. And we have more terrific music for you as the skies are lighting up over Houston, Texas.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Look at that. I mean, it is, one, great music --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- from Bleachers. But the amphitheatre there at Red Rock, beautiful, the lights on the sandstone, you've got 10,000 people, and those are the best concerts. When you go there, everybody is up on their feet singing along.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: They know all the words.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: They know all the words. It's fantastic. And Houston still has their show going on. SIDNER

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It is so old and so beautiful and just -- it makes you, like, think. But I got to tell you, there was a story the other day, I think a couple days ago.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: People are claiming they saw UFOs.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Oh, come on.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: I'm just saying.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Come on.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Over the stage, like, up above. People are, like, we saw something during a concert.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Well, there are fireworks tonight. So, you can't claim UFOs.(LAUGHTER) If you see some lights in the sky, they're fireworks.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It's just fireworks. Don't call anybody. Don't call the FBI.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Houston has one of the biggest shows in the country. More than 1,200 pounds of fireworks that they're exploding tonight. And the show dedicated to the first responders who have taken care of the people in Houston. They've had some crazy weather recently, dangerous weather, and they are celebrating and honoring the people who've served them over the last year.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It's a beautiful thing. We need our first responders like nobody else. We do want to remind you, what you saw just a moment ago. You're looking at these gorgeous fireworks. You're going to see more fireworks from around the country and --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: -- in Guam.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: In Guam, 6,000 miles away.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Never seen that before.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Alaska as well.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Love that.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And so, we're here under the canopy of what will be the biggest fireworks show on the West Coast. Now, as I said, the seawall is filling in, families are coming in here, but we're starting to see some of the tour boats, the larger boats come out on the water to be able to view it here from the bay as well. They're going to get a great show.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Gorgeous.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We should also mention Bleachers. Their album, "Bleachers," is out now and the band is currently on a world tour. So --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Catch it.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- catch them when you can.(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: A gorgeous view here in San Diego. The West Coast's biggest fireworks show will start soon. It will be launched from four barges on the bay. It is going to be fantastic. It is one of the most technically-advanced fireworks shows in the country. Our big holiday celebration continues here on CNN with fireworks from St. Louis and some classic rock and roll.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: I love to see these guys still rocking out. It gives me utter joy to see folks just going and going and going.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: That song is almost 45 years old.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Shut your mouth. (LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I mean --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: That hurts my heart.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- it's classic and beautiful.(LAUGHTER) It still holds up.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It does. It holds the test of time.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It holds up.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And you can catch REO Speedwagon, they're co-headlining with Train this summer, and they're going to be back at their Las Vegas residency in October.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: All right, our director, Reza, is showing you this gorgeous skyline here in San Diego.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Wow.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Look at that fabulousness. You can't get that everywhere.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And we can hear the music that's coming out of that band shell there. There's a concert going over there. They were just singing "Night Shift." Listen, the stage is set.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It is set and it is going to be absolutely fabulous. The sky is drenched in red, white, and blue.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: All the sparkles because you know I love some sparkles.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I know you do.(LAUGHTER) SIDNER: We're going to be bringing you 4th of July celebrations across the nation. Of course, the largest celebration here in the West Coast, right here in San Diego. It's big.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Now, before we get here, we've got something for you from New Orleans. The fireworks there up next, and singer and actor Ben Platt performs for us while on "The Honeymind Tour." He's appearing at Wolf Trap in Vienna, Virginia.(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: That is Ben Platt you're hearing there and you're seeing these gorgeous pictures from Fort Lauderdale as people are celebrating. Look at all those folks out there on the beach enjoying their lives. I love it. Look at America.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You know what? Last year, when I was doing this show, I was trying to describe the firework I love the most. I had to go look up the style. It's called a willow.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It -- so --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: The one that pours over like that or brocade if you're going into the deep details.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Can't see.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah. I just --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: I'm good with the sparkly, right?(LAUGHTER) You want the willow.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I was -- I was looking at the fireworks and I was, like, I need to find out what the name of that is, so I sound like I actually prepared this year.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And you always do.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Thank you. Thank you. SIDNER

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: -- very 4th of July, very Independence Day.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: There's no such thing as two on the nose for the 4th.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Agree.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You wear the red, white, and the blue.(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: We've got all of it. You've got all of it. All right, we're just minutes away from the main event here in San Diego, like literally minutes away. A big bay boom. You're about to see it all. We're saving some of the best fireworks for last and bringing you some epic music from the Goo Goo Dolls and the pop punk rock band Yellowcard. First, a very quick break. Don't go away.(COMMERCIAL BREAK)
